mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.dealcode AS "dealcode", a.status AS "status", a.issueTypes AS "issueTypesByJson", a.description AS "description", a.updateRole AS "updateRole", a.updateDate AS "updateDate", a.updateBy AS "updateBy.name", a.recorderName AS "recorderName", a.createDate AS "createDate", a.handlingIssueTypes AS "handlingIssueTypesByJson", a.handlingResult AS "handlingResult", a.userName AS "userName", a.remindingType AS remindingType, a.issueChannel AS "issueChannel"
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_mis_dunning_task_issue a LEFT JOIN t_mis_dunning_task t ON a.dealcode = t.dealcode LEFT JOIN t_mis_dunning_people p ON t.DunningPeopleId=p.id -- 已完成案件任意一人度过即算已读, 未完成案件需要本人读 LEFT JOIN t_mis_task_issue_read_record r ON a.status = "UNRESOLVED" AND a.id =r.taskIssueId AND r.userId = #{userid} LEFT JOIN t_mis_task_issue_read_record anyr ON a.status = "RESOLVED" AND a.id =anyr.taskIssueId WHERE p.id = #{userid} AND a.remindingType = "DUNNING_PEOPLE" AND r.taskIssueId IS NULL AND anyr.taskIssueId IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mis_dunning_task_issue( id, dealcode, status, issueTypes, description, updateRole, updateDate, updateBy, recorderName, createDate, handlingIssueTypes, handlingResult, userName, remindingType, issueChannel )VALUES ( #{id}, #{dealcode}, #{status}, #{issueTypesToJson}, #{description}, #{updateRole}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.name}, #{recorderName}, #{createDate}, #{handlingIssueTypesToJson}, #{handlingResult}, #{userName}, #{remindingType}, #{issueChannel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mis_dunning_task_issue SET status = #{status}, updateRole = #{updateRole}, updateDate = #{updateDate}, updateBy = #{updateBy.name}, handlingIssueTypes = #{handlingIssueTypesToJson}, handlingResult = #{handlingResult} WHERE id = #{id}
